pt_PT_euro {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u20AC",
            "EUR ",
            "$",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
            "dd-MMMM-yyyy",
            "dd-MMMM-yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "Dom",
            "Seg",
            "Ter",
            "Qua",
            "Qui",
            "Sex",
            "S\u00E1b",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "Domingo",
            "Segunda",
            "Ter\u00E7a",
            "Quarta",
            "Quinta",
            "Sexta",
            "S\u00E1bado",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Portuguese locale for Portugal with Euro" }
        Source { "Free Software Foundation, Inc." }
        Address { "59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Portuguese" }
        Territory { "Portugal" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-08-20" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[SsyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Jan",
            "Fev",
            "Mar",
            "Abr",
            "Mai",
            "Jun",
            "Jul",
            "Ago",
            "Set",
            "Out",
            "Nov",
            "Dez",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "Janeiro",
            "Fevereiro",
            "Mar\u00E7o",
            "Abril",
            "Maio",
            "Junho",
            "Julho",
            "Agosto",
            "Setembro",
            "Outubro",
            "Novembro",
            "Dezembro",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "00" }
        InternationalPrefix { "351" }
    }
}
